text: Last Thursday, experts from @STJOESHAMILTON, @MGD_CMCR, and @HamHealthSci hosted a public forum on #Cannabis for pain management in cancer. This was the UCCRI's third public outreach event since its launch in 2019. Learn more: https://t.co/k02qM1MurZ | #cancer #urology #onHWS https://t.co/oLsgAOd620
